At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I go to the ground floor of the gray building.  
B. I take off and fly over the city buildings.  
C. I turn left at the brown sandstone house.  
D. I zoom in on the red bulletin board.  
E. I zoom in on the satellite dish.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The sequence of images shows a transition from a bridge to an aerial view over city buildings, indicating that the agent has taken off and is now flying over the city buildings as instructed.
